newsitem.title: USA: Shoe Carnival Sept. same store sales rise.
newsitem.headline: Shoe Carnival Sept. same store sales rise.

text.p: Shoe Carnival Inc said Thursday its same store sales for the five weeks ended October 5, 1996 rose one percent from the comparable period last year.
Total sales for the five-week period were $21.4 million, which were flat when compared with sales of $21.4 million for the five weeks ended September 30, 1995.

Comparable store sales for the 35 weeks of fiscal 1996 fell 2.2 percent from a year ago. Total sales for the first 35 weeks of fiscal 1996 increased 5.3 percent to $164.1 million from sales of $155.9 million for the same period last year.
Shoe Carnival operates 92 footwear stores located in the Midwest and Midsouth.
